cancelSale().details: Can be called only by the Project admin address.

params.proof: The merkle proof verification for the return.
The merkle proof verification for claiming.

emergencyWithdraw(address,address,uint25.details: Can be called only by the Legion admin address.

params.token: The address of the token to be withdrawn.

publishExcessCapitalResults(bytes32).details: Can be called only by the Legion admin address.

params.merkleRoot: The merkle root to verify against.

supplyTokens(uint256,uint256).details: Can be called only by the Project admin address.

params.amount: The token amount supplied by the project.
params.legionFee: The token amount supplied by the project.

withdrawCapital().details: Can be called only by the Project admin address.

cancelExpiredSale().notice: Cancels a sale in case the project has not supplied tokens after the lockup period is over.

claimBackCapitalIfCanceled().notice: Claims back capital in case the sale has been canceled.

claimExcessCapital(uint256,bytes32[]).notice: Claim excess capital back to the investor.

emergencyWithdraw(address,address,uint25.notice: Withdraw tokens from the contract in case of emergency.

publishExcessCapitalResults(bytes32).notice: Publish merkle root for distribution of excess capital, once the sale has concluded.

releaseTokens().notice: Releases tokens to the investor address.

requestRefund().notice: Request a refund from the sale during the applicable time window.

supplyTokens(uint256,uint256).notice: Supply tokens once the sale results have been published.

withdrawCapital().notice: Withdraw capital from the sale contract.
